channel.title: postgresql, on Ihsan F. A. Muharram
channel.description: Recent content in postgresql, on Ihsan F. A. Muharram

item.title: postgres Delete PGwal
item.description: matikan service postgres => pg_ctlcluster 13 main stop setting postgres wal_level = minimal archive_mode = off comment archive_command => #archive_command hapus file di pg_archive => masuk ke folder pg_archive jalankan perintah rm -rf * hapus file di pg_wal 3 hari sebelum hari ini => masuk ke folder pg_wal jalankan perintah find . -type f -mtime +3 -exec rm {} ;
